titleStmt.title: To the right honourable His Majesties judges, now sitting in Oxon, &c the humble petition of Stephen Jay, clerk, rector of Chinner, in the county of Oxon.
titleStmt.author: Jay, Stephen, d. 1689.

notesStmt.note: Verso of sheet contains a further petition with caption: To the worshipful his Majesties justices for the county of Oxon.
Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
